response: Welcome to the 120th anniversary of Harley Davidson, where we celebrate with six limited edition anniversary motorcycle models. Inspired by the art deco features of the 1933 V.L.D. Speedbird, our designers have created unique and dynamic anniversary designs. The base color on all anniversary models is heirloom red, modernized with advanced painting technology. Each model is marked with a unique serial number tag, adding exclusivity. The 120th anniversary models are a superb combination of tradition and contemporary styling, a testament to our pride in craftsmanship. Stay tuned as we delve into the unique features of these special models.
